login.loginPasswordDisclaimer1: Your password is sent directly to mojang and never stored.
login.loginPasswordDisclaimer2: Helios Launcher is not affiliated with Mojang AB.

overlay.overlayDesc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud..

settings.tabAccountHeaderDesc: Add new accounts or manage existing ones.
settings.autoConnectTitle: Automatically connect to the server on launch.
settings.launchDetachedTitle: Launch game process detached from launcher.
settings.launchDetachedDesc: If the game is not detached, closing the launcher will also close the game.
settings.shaderpackDesc: Enable or disable shaders. Please note, shaders will only run smoothly on powerful setups. You may add custom packs here.
settings.memoryDesc: The recommended minimum RAM is 3 gigabytes. Setting the minimum and maximum values to the same value may reduce lag.
settings.javaExecDesc: The Java executable is validated before game launch.
settings.javaPathDesc: The path should end with bin<%= process.platform === 'win32' ? '\\javaw.exe' : '/java' %>.
settings.jvmOptsDesc: Options to be provided to the JVM at runtime. -Xms and -Xmx should not be included.
settings.launcherTabHeaderDesc: Options related to the launcher itself.
settings.allowPrereleaseDesc:
Pre-Releases include new features which may have not been fully tested or integrated.
This will always be true if you are using a pre-release version.
settings.dataDirectoryDesc:
All game files and local Java installations will be stored in the data directory.
Screenshots and world saves are stored in the instance folder for the corresponding server configuration.
settings.aboutTabHeaderDesc: View information and release notes for the current version.
settings.launcherUpdatesHeaderDesc: Download, install, and review updates for the launcher.
settings.latestVersion: You Are Running the Latest Version

welcome.welcomeDescription: Our mission is to recreate the universe imagined by author George RR Martin in his fantasy series, A Song of Ice and Fire.  Through the collaborative effort of thousands of community members, we have sought to create Westeros as accurately and precisely as possible within Minecraft.  The world we are creating is yours to explore.  Journey from Dorne to Castle Black, and if you arenâ€™t afraid, beyond the Wall itself, but best not delay.  As the words of House Stark ominously warn: Winter is Coming.
welcome.welcomeDescCTA: You are just a few clicks away from Westeros.

userMigrated.title:
Error During Login:
Invalid Credentials
userMigrated.desc: You've attempted to login with a migrated account. Try again using the account email as the username.

invalidCredentials.title:
Error During Login:
Invalid Credentials
invalidCredentials.desc: The email or password you've entered is incorrect. Please try again.

rateLimit.title:
Error During Login:
Too Many Attempts
rateLimit.desc: There have been too many login attempts with this account recently. Please try again later.

noInternet.title:
Error During Login:
No Internet Connection
noInternet.desc: You must be connected to the internet in order to login. Please connect and try again.

authDown.title:
Error During Login:
Authentication Server Offline
authDown.desc: Mojang's authentication server is currently offline or unreachable. Please wait a bit and try again. You can check the status of the server on Mojang's help portal.

notPaid.title:
Error During Login:
Game Not Purchased
notPaid.desc:
The account you are trying to login with has not purchased a copy of Minecraft.
You may purchase a copy on Minecraft.net
